item.description:
Before the details of our next meeting I would like to mention the upcoming changes in the future plan, the changes that we will propose soon. In a nutshell we will propose alternatives to “jump” forward in time to more interesting, dare I say popular topics. Announcement will come soon.

Our next meeting in less than two weeks will focus on stoic (ancient stoic) philosophy. One original text is suggested for reading: the Stoic Philosophy of Seneca, ISBN: 0-393-00459-7. This is about a 230 pages (small pages) collection of Seneca’s various philosophical writings.

Other interesting readings are the related topics in the encyclopedias from last time (the Internet and the Stanford Encyclopedias of Philosophy):
http://www.utm.edu/re...
http://plato.stanford...
The Catholic Encyclopedia may be useful too at times:
http://www.newadvent....
